page.title: 20FASHION AT ELEVEN
page.content: We wanted to know what{clothes children of our age like to wear, so we organised a survey. We questioned all the{Second Year children}in our {Middle School.} Most girls prefer a {full shoe. Ear-rings}are the most popular piece of{jewellery.} Most girls do not like to colour their hair and prefer{long hair. }Many of the girls like{short skirts.} Only one girl does not wear makeup at some time. {Knee-length and ankle-length {socks}are preferred to any other leg- wear. When we spoke to the boys we found that they prefer{trainers}to any other shoes. They do not really wear any jewellery except{watches. }Nearly all the boys like to wear{jeans}and {fashionable clothes.} Most boys prefer {short hair. }The boys seem to like girls wearing trousers.
